title: Login issues
body:
I have trouble logging onto LOL. Every time i try, this message pops up. Any suggestions?

CONNECTION FALIURE: UNABLE TO CONNECT TO THE PVP.NET SERVER.

replies.body:
The error message you're seeing indicates that your client is not able to establish a stable connection to the PvP.net service. The most common cause for this is either problematic local network configurations or ISP routing problems. Our [connection troubleshooting guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) is a great place to start in resolving this issue and goes over the most common fixes for it.

Hit me up if you still encounter issues after working through that guide.

Well if you are positive it's not your internet connection, it could be a problem with the client itself. If it's getting beyond frustrating try reinstalling or contacting riot support https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
